refs.comment: Listed on LinkedIn profile as Download Public PGP Key link
LinkedIn profile showing identity verification by CLEAR using government ID
Industry certification requiring strong identity verification during proctored high stakes exam with Global Information Assurance Certification (https://www.giac.org/knowledge-base/proctor/)
Credly profile showing both user photo and industry certification with link to ORCiD profile (https://orcid.org/0009-0008-5528-9362)

OrciD profile referenced by Credly profile listing verified email domains, websites, social links, and GPG fingerprints in Keywords section using Uniform Resource Name format: urn:identity:gpg:<fingerprint>
